Chinese
Keep on fighting.

There is something inside, that they can't get to, that they can't touch. That's yours.

I am Yong Yuan, an Computer Vision Algorithm Engineer in Kwai (MeiTuan->KuaiShou). I completed Master's degree in University of Chinese Academy of Sciences on June 22, 2016 and earned Bachelor's degree in Faculty of Science at Xidian University of science and technology of the electronics information on July 1，2013.

My research interests cover Content-based Image Retrieval (more than five years experience), Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search, Content-based Video Copy Detection and Video Classification.

I support open source (@willard-yuan), love coding. In my free time, I dive into writing, losing in thinking, reading books to enrich themselves.

  • 16 Mar 2018图像检索：图像拷贝检索PHash改进方案
